column5: Cozy 3 bed, one bath home conveniently located in San Leon, TX within 20 minutes of Kemah Boardwalk to the North, and Galveston Island attractions like Moody Gardens, Bishops Palace, and the Pleasure Pier to the South. If you have work in the area from Texas City to Baytown, this spot would be convenient as well. The Property is located about 1 mile from Galveston Bay and also has catch and release fishing privileges for the neighboring stocked pond. Have a bigger group? There's RV hookup too
